'''1.14.40''' is the first and only beta of [[Education Edition 1.14.50]], released on October 14, 2020, which added new Learn to Code features.<ref>{{cite|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20201027025357/https://educommunity.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360049494792-Feature-Walkthrough-Minecraft-Education-Edition-Learn-to-Code-Beta-Version-1-14-40-|title=Feature Walkthrough Minecraft: Education Edition Learn to Code Beta (Version 1.14.40)|website=educommunity.minecraft.net}}</ref>

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''Coding interface'''
* New coding interface (IDE) uses python in a notebook-style interface which alternates between instructions and opportunities to write code.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Code Builder'''
* Relocated menus to provide more space for coding and the menu options to be more understandable.
* Home and Reset Editor buttons have been added to the Code Builder menu.

'''Library Updates '''
* Mac and iPad users can now share or assign Library lessons via Google Classroom or email.

'''URL Allow List'''
* All authentication is now done using *.minecrafteduservices.com.

== Fixes ==
* Various fixes to address known issues.</onlyinclude>
